verses.verse: O geue thankes vnto the Lorde, for he is gracyous, and hys mercy endureth for euer.
O geue thankes vnto the God of all goddes, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
O thanke the Lord of all Lordes, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Whych only doth greate wonders, for his mercy endureth for euer.
Which by his excellentt wysdome made the heauens, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Whych layed out the earth aboue the waters, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Whych hath made greate lyghtes, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
The sunne to rule the daye, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
The Moone and the starres to gouerne the nyght, for his mercy endureth for euer.
Whych smote Egypt wyth theyr fyrst borne, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
And brought out Israel from amonge them, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Wyth a myghtye hande and stretched out arme, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Whych deuyded the reed see into partes, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
And made Israel to go thorowe the myddest of it, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
But as for Pharao and hys hoost, he ouerthrewe them in the reed see, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Which led his people thorowe the wildernesse, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Which smote great kinges: for his mercy endureth for euer.
Yee, & slue myghtye kynges: for his mercy endureth for euer.
Sehon kynge of the Amorites: for hys mercy endureth for euer.
And Og the kyng of Basan: for hys mercy endureth for euer.
And gaue awaye theyr lande for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for euer.
Euen for an heritage vnto Israel hys seruaunt: for hys mercy endureth for euer.
Which remembred vs, when we were in trouble: for his mercy endureth for euer.
And hath delyuered vs from oure enemyes: for his mercy endureth for euer.
Whych geueth fode vnto all flesshe: for hys mercy endureth for euer.
O geue thanckes vnto the God of heauen, for hys mercy endureth for euer.
